attributes.action: Abolish the plans by Halifax to charge Customers daily for Pre-Arranged Overdrafts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently the Halifax had announced its changing the overdraft scheme for its customers.  Under the new plans instead of charging a set APR rate on the overdraft it will charge Customers between £1 and £2 Daily for use of overdrafts they have already agreed with the lender.  

An example of such is if Person X overdraws into his/her arranged overdraft by just £1 they could be charged £365 per year for it.    This is simply unfair on all its customers from a Bank we own the majority of during a recession.   

We the undersigned believe this to be an unfair and ludicrous charging scheme. If allowed to continue this new charging system would make profit to the Halifax at the expense of the hardest working people who at the current time are struggling to survive during the hardest times this Nation has seen.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
